SEARCH
Package ca.techgarage.scrubians.events

Interface ViolentNpcDeathCallback

Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface ViolentNpcDeathCallback
Event callback for when a violent NPC dies Other mods can register listeners to be notified when violent NPCs are killed Example usage in another mod: ViolentNpcDeathCallback.EVENT.register((world, entity, npcId, name, entityType, damageSource) -> { // Your custom logic here System.out.println("Violent NPC " + name + " (ID: " + npcId + ") was killed!"); });

  • Method Details

    • onViolentNpcDeath

      void onViolentNpcDeath(net.minecraft.server.world.ServerWorld world, net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity, int npcId, String name, String entityType, net.minecraft.entity.damage.DamageSource damageSource)
      Called when a violent NPC dies
      Parameters:
      world - The world the NPC died in
      entity - The entity that died
      npcId - The NPC's registry ID
      name - The NPC's custom name
      entityType - The base entity type (e.g., "zombie", "skeleton")
      damageSource - The source of damage that killed the NPC
